migrations.description: Update Angular packages 'dependencies' and 'devDependencies' version prefix to '^' instead of '~'.
migrations.name: update-angular-packages-version-prefix

migrations.description: Remove 'showCircularDependencies' option from browser and server builders.
migrations.name: remove-show-circular-dependencies-option

migrations.description: Remove 'defaultProject' option from workspace configuration. The project to use will be determined from the current working directory.
migrations.name: remove-default-project-option

migrations.description: Replace 'defaultCollection' option in workspace configuration with 'schematicCollections'.
migrations.name: replace-default-collection-option

migrations.description: Remove 'package.json' files from library projects secondary entrypoints.
migrations.name: update-libraries-secondary-entrypoints
